alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 7:17PM PST until March 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, mainly above 2000 feet elevation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until noon PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Light snow is possible on Highways 46 through the Santa Lucia Mountains and interior San Luis Obispo County, Highway 101 over Cuesta Pass, Highway 166 in the Cuyama Valley, as well as Highway 154 through San Marcos Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
